mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GO_MEMBER(MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, MEM_PHONE, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_STAT, ENABLED) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER.NEXTVAL, #{mem_id}, #{mem_pwd}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_email}, 'W', 1)
mapper.select: select mem_id from GO_MEMBER where mem_email = #{mem_email}
mapper.update: update GO_MEMBER set mem_pwd = #{mem_pwd} where mem_id = #{mem_id}
UPDATE GO_MEMBER SET mem_name = #{mem_name} , mem_email = #{mem_email}, mem_phone = #{mem_phone} WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id}
update GO_MEMBER set mem_pwd = #{mem_pwd} where mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.select: SELECT member.mem_id, mem_pwd, mem_name, mem_phone, mem_email, mem_stat enabled, auth FROM GO_MEMBER member LEFT OUTER JOIN GO_MEMBER_auth auth on member.mem_id = auth.mem_id WHERE member.mem_id = #{mem_id} AND mem_stat = 'R'
SELECT mem_id, mem_name, mem_email, mem_phone FROM GO_MEMBER WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GO_MEMBER_AUTH WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id} AND auth = #{role}
